text.description:
{Vampire Fang}

Stack equipped with this artifact becomes Undead, gains 2 Speed and heals for 30% of any damage dealt. This effect can revive dead units in the stack.
text.event: After a fight with some vampires, who were more troublesome than difficult, you rip one of their fangs out of anger and put it into your pouch as a trophy.
text.name: Vampire Fang
